languages.text: "Я предупреждала тебя, что обряд был ошибкой, и за это ты превратил меня в чудовище! Ничтожество, даже в этом ты не преуспел..."

traits.locale_text: "Я ведь предупреждала тебя о том, что этот ритуал был ошибкой. И лишь за это ты решил меня в чудовище? Несчастный гордец, и даже в этом ты не преуспел..."

languages.text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."
languages.original_text: "Я предупреждала тебя, что обряд был ошибкой, и за это ты превратил меня в чудовище! Ничтожество, даже в этом ты не преуспел..."

traits.locale_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, useless wretch..."
"I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, useless wretch..."
"I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, useless wretch..."
"I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, useless wretch..."
"I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."
"I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."

languages.text: «¡Le había advertido de que el ritual era un error, y, por ello, me convirtió en un monstruo! Incluso en eso fracasó, necio miserable...».
languages.original_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Le había advertido de que el ritual era un error, y, por ello, me convirtió en un monstruo! Incluso en eso fracasó, necio miserable...».

languages.text: 「儀式は間違いだと警告したというのに…私を怪物に変えて…！それさえも失敗して、なんて惨めで愚かなんだ…」
languages.original_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."

traits.locale_text: 「儀式は間違いだと警告したというのに…私を怪物に変えて…！それさえも失敗して、なんて惨めで愚かなんだ…」

languages.text: “我早就警告过你，说那场仪式简直是胡来！可你却把我变成了个怪物！而你甚至连变怪物都变不好，你这个蠢货，何等可悲……”
languages.original_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."

traits.locale_text: “我早就警告过你，说那场仪式简直是胡来！可你却把我变成了个怪物！而你甚至连变怪物都变不好，你这个蠢货，何等可悲……”

languages.text: "Ich hatte Euch gewarnt, dass das Ritual ein Fehler ist, und dafür habt Ihr mich in ein Monster verwandelt! Nicht einmal das ist Euch gelungen, Ihr erbärmlicher Narr ..."
languages.original_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte Euch gewarnt, dass das Ritual ein Fehler ist, und dafür habt Ihr mich in ein Monster verwandelt! Nicht einmal das ist Euch gelungen, Ihr erbärmlicher Narr ..."

languages.text: « J'avais prévenu que ce rituel était une erreur, et qu'avez-vous fait pour me remercier ? Vous avez fait de moi un monstre ! Et même là, vous avez échoué, pauvre imbécile... »
languages.original_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."

traits.locale_text: « J'avais prévenu que ce rituel était une erreur, et qu'avez-vous fait pour me remercier ? Vous avez fait de moi un monstre ! Et même là, vous avez échoué, pauvre imbécile... »

languages.text: "Seni ayinin hata olduğuna dair uyarmıştım. Bunun karşılığında beni bir canavara çevirdin! Bunu bile beceremedin sefil ahmak..."
languages.original_text: "I had warned you that the ritual was a mistake, and for that, you turned me into a monster! You failed even at that, you miserable fool..."
